hydra.strategy: Never melee with bladed weapons. Use clubs, magic, or wands of flame. Fire is ideal.

sigmund.strategy: Flee if XL<5. Has hexes (confuse, paralyze) and scythe. Come back later.

centaur.strategy: Throwing enemy — close distance quickly or use cover. Don't fight in open.

orc_pack.strategy: Never fight in the open. Lure to corridor for 1v1.

jelly.strategy: Corrodes equipment on melee. Avoid melee if possible, use ranged/magic.

ball_python.strategy: Constriction damage in groups is dangerous. Kill first to avoid being held.

adder.strategy: Poisonous — kill quickly or retreat if low HP

gnoll.strategy: Often come in packs. Use corridors to fight 1v1.

robin.strategy: Goblin unique that summons allies. Kill quickly before overwhelmed.
